DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare efficacy Boonme stick exercise quadriceps strengthen exercise knee osteoarthritis.Patients diagnose knee osteoarthritis use Altman criterion randomize 2 group use simple random technique . Patients instruct trained quadriceps Boonme stick exercise one-trained physical therapist . All patient treat behavioral modification , NSAIDs analgesic drug regularly follow-up . Assessment include visual analogue scale , exercise compliance , WOMAC patient satisfaction do assessor blind fashion .
DOC.brief_title: Stick Versus Quadricep Exercise Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.criteria: knee osteoarthritis use Altman criterion problem communication ability
